h3.sub: The mission of the Freehold Township Schools, in partnership with our community, is to prepare all students to be responsible citizens and life long learners.

div.div: The Freehold Township School District is currently closed. Although this closure is indefinite as per Governor Murphy, our tentative return date is Monday, April 20. Families should plan child care for this date to extend later, if necessary.

We are excited to announce that we will be expanding preschool programs for the 2020-2021 school year and will be offering full day preschool for all students beginning in September. REGISTRATION IS OPEN NOW!
